data.title: the manager sucks, and is selfish and nit picky
data.text: We help take care of senior citizens, the manager will only give one senior drink in the drive through even though she can see all of them in the car. so we have to go to the Brentwood Wendy's to get our seniors a free drink. The Brentwood Wendy's is much friendlier, cleaner and you can actually understand the people who work there! IN Antioch it is hard to communicate with the hired help since they have such thick accents.

data.title: Very Good!
data.text: Clean and very quick! very friendly staff, bathrooms are clean. Parking lot is clean and the drive thur is quick

data.title: Food was great, service, not so much this time
data.text:
It was late (past the dinner hour) and we were hungry so I decided to go to Wendy's for some good food. The guy who took my order, Jorge, average height and stocky build, seemed to be confused when taking my order. I repeated it twice for him. When I got home, I realized that he had not charged me for one of the items I had asked for and of course, it wasn't in my bag. My feeling is that when taking a to go order, you must get it right to save extra trips back to get what was ordered. This is the first time I have had an issue at this location. 
There is another Jorge who does a great job as does Ester and Monique and they are to be commended for their ability to get orders right and have a smile on their face while doing it.

data.title: Good fast food...great service
data.text: This Wendy's has been recently remodeled and looks great. The food quality is  WAY above average for fast food. There are many great employees that work there, one of which is named Jorge who always gives top notch service. I realize that fast food doesn't usually allow tipping for great service so this is what I can do for him. I highly recommend this Wendy's for service and quality.
